name: The Mermaid
description: An estimated 35,000 to 100,000 women were executed for witchcraft or related "crimes".Many of them burned, drowned or otherwise executed, often solely for becoming too influential within township, or other vain pursuits. In my mind, I have created the narrative that this is the origin of mermaids, who would lure men to their death with wailing and song. In this artwork I combine the image of the drowning woman (does she float?) with the image of the mermaid.
